actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to withdraw from mining and mineral leasing certain public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest in the State of Washington.

summary.text: Withdraws specified public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest in the State of Washington from: (1) all forms of entry or disposal under the public land laws; (2) location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (3) disposition under all the mineral and geothermal leasing laws.

titles.title: A bill to withdraw from mining and mineral leasing certain public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest in the State of Washington.
